programme.title: A Summer to Remember
programme.desc: A doctor takes her teenage daughter to Fiji, hoping to reconnect and improve their relationship.

programme.title: Love on the Slopes

programme.desc: An efficiency expert goes to Montana before the holidays and attempts to help a man save his ranch.

programme.desc: Sparks fly when an engaged country-music star (Jesse Metcalfe) reconnects with a childhood friend (Autumn Reeser).

programme.desc: A writer returns to her family ranch where she discovers what ended her marriage and why she stopped riding horses.

programme.title: Roadhouse Romance
programme.desc: Lt. Callie Jackson returns home after a military tour to find her late grandfather's barbecue joint is struggling, but she has a run-in with a TV director who teaches her that sometimes it's best to look forward instead of looking back.

programme.title: Double Scoop
programme.desc: Nora discovers the best ice cream and hopes to land them as a client. Her sweet dreams hit a snag when her former colleague James has the same idea. Old sparks begin to melt the frosty tension. Stars Taylor Cole, Ryan McPartlin.
